title: Just, why is this okay.
body:
Look at my history for reference.
2 Games (alone), 8 int feeders.
Before that, people flaming non stop because "SUPART NUT REEL RAWL"
Before that, AFKs and Int feeders again.

I legit wish I could say I was over exaggerating, but if you watch them games, you'd be like "Holy crap, his been right all along." 
How is this okay, but calling out the overly negative behaviour not okay?
Its almost like being an "arsehat" (quoting RITO) is okay, but its not okay to be against it.
Just, trying to work out the non existant logic there hurts my head. 

INB4 same beta that cries on all my posts shows up defending the behaviour.

replies.body:
I'll just leave this here :)

https://imgur.com/a/8fO3a 

youre doing a good job riot :)
ive been in worse, 1 time i was in massive losing streak and had a record of 9 lose in  a row along with 20% or less win rate :) fun
